result.name: Google Razor Glass - Frosted Glass Blur Effects
result.description:
Please Enable Dark Mode on YouTube and Google first before using this theme.

Razor Glass is a UI skin that adds many blur effects, animations, transitions, and modern gradients to many websites:
Google
Google docs
docs.unity.com
nexusmods.com
YouTube.com

Make sure to uninstall and reinstall Razor Glass periodically to see new changes.

Please submit bugs to the style form link below. Commenting bugs will result in slower solution times.

--------------------Please donate to Razor Glass on my Account Profile--------------------
Keywords: Blur Effects, Gradients, Shadows, Animate, Animated, Transition, Dark Mode, Aero Glass, Modern, Custom Background, Homepage Background

Submit any requests for website customization or changes to:

https://forms.office.com/r/sAYTdrg8wn
result.notes:
| Razor Glass is shattering into multiple styles soon - different styles for different websites |

---Sorry It's been a while since updates have come out - school is getting more time consuming---

\
  Working on major YouTube update again
/
Gmail search bar issue has been resolved. The search bar works again.
Submit any suggestions for a Facebook Redesign to the RG Form
YouTube completely redesigned again following UI changes
YouTube Fullscreen issue fixed. Fullscreen videos now appear.
We are currently working on YouTube's new ambient mode and its integration in razor glass.
YouTube Timeline Transition bug fixed. It no longer jumps from frame to frame with a transition effect.
Google RG V2 released! Google has been completely redesigned!
